name: THE LINK
description:
THE LINK is my entry for the GMTK jam 2018 ! 

The theme of the jam was  : Genre, without mechanic ! So I made a multiplayer game without the need for multiple players.

You control two brothers, both of which share the same health and must battle increasingly dangerous enemies ! 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

THE RULES : 

- MOVE with the ARROW KEYS

- SHOOT with the LEFT MOUSE BUTTON

- SWITCH CHARACTER with the RIGHT MOUSE BUTTON

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My YOUTUBE channel : https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC9Z1XWw1kmnvOOFsj6Bzy2g/videos?view_as=subscrib...
